GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dp: make eDP panel as the first connected connector

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit adbe8cb186354f468c8635afa300751a02137eb2, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit ef7837ff091c8805cfa18d2ad06c2e5f4d820a7e. For more details please see the references link.
